description_text:
Bonjour juste une petite question si j'achète un pédalier chez vous je suis de Belgique et j'aurai des frais de douane Merci a vous

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi jp colson,    Sorry for the late reply.  ​Due to the New Year holiday and the subsequent surge in orders, a significant backlog of unprocessed emails has resulted in delayed responses. We extend our deepest apologies once again.  If you purchase the pedal and ship it to Belgium, there will be no customs duties. Please rest assured.
